summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1273, for the improvement of Grand Boulevard, from Thirteenth Avenue West to Twentieth Avenue West; certain parts of certain other streets, all in the City of Seattle, therein named, by constructing water mains of proper dimensions and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 13965 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
